Full grain napa leather upper with suede detailing

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, no drop, comfortable base, neutral color, fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these GoPlae white because it's the style in Europe, but also because they are gender neutral. You can pass them down if they survive one child! Of course, I also like the quality as usually. I am appreciative that the sole is flexible, and that the base is not too narrow. Also, notice that the sneakers have zero drop, no heels, which supposedly is better for children musculoskeletal development. But by all means, search about it! My children loves them. And they usually wear this brand or Livie and Luca.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Farley

customer_reviews.title: Straps get lost easily ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product BUT the straps come out too easily and get lost, thus making the whole shoes useless. My son lost the strap which the means that the shoe is now sitting idle. They really need to offer the straps as a separate add on or redesign it so it doesn't fall out so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Divya Sundaram

customer_reviews.title: Work very well for SMOs
customer_reviews.text: My son wears smos and these are very easy to put on and take off for him. The velcro stays put and he likes that he can switch out the tabs. Longer tabs can be bought which is great. My only problem with them is that they seem to be wearing very quickly where the plastic of the smo rubs against the inside of the shoe. Hoping they last!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unless you consider looking like hell but still holding together lasting
customer_reviews.text: For what it is advertised as; shoes that last, they really don't! Unless you consider looking like hell but still holding together lasting.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my Grandson. They look too big but they are his size. We love them especially because they can wipe clean and are not discoloring like " regular" white shoes. I loved the flaps feature before i bought them but then he lost one, from one side. I would buy more though.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these shoes. Hard to find plain white shoes for boys. This brand fits and wears like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Yancey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: the whole shoe flaps open and this makes it very easy for children to put shoes on for themselves
customer_reviews.text: My child has a high instep and it is impossible to find shoes that are wide enough. The extra extra wide ones sold by Stride Rite and Saucont that I do find only Velcro half way across the foot. The long straps on these shoes are incredible and are even bigger than we need (which is awesome). Plus, when you open the shoe, the whole shoe flaps open and this makes it very easy for children to put shoes on for themselves. I am very pleased with this shoe and would definitely buy again. I am clicking "TOO WIDE" for the parents out there that struggle to find shoes that fit wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Belle

customer_reviews.title: 👍

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids w/ sensory issues but black leather fades quick
customer_reviews.text: We bought the black ones cause he needed all black for school. They did last however the black faded very quickly. My son has sensory issues and this shoe fit all the check marks for comfort. Luckily I don’t have to buy all black again but will for sure buy plae again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

product_meta.title: PLAE Kids' ROAN Sneaker
product_meta.description: Roan - the style icon. This sleek silhouette is the ultimate blank slate in simple black or white. A customized, statement-worthy look in nappa leather and suede, any way you rock it is a win-win. PLAE designs premium quality products that are fun, engaging and built for the way kids play. PLAE uses the biometric science generally reserved for elite athletes to craft a shoe that protects the natural development of children's feet.
